description:
Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Jonouchi can barely stand up, much less duel!  However, he has no time to rest before he faces a fresh and determined Mai!  Both their souls are once again on the line inside Seal of Orichalcos, but unlike last time, this duel is NOT going to end in a draw! Can Jonouchi make it two victories in a row, even if it means trapping Mai’s soul away forever?
Source: crunchyroll
